subject: Ratings and Rating Systems
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Orlando made a dozen 3-pointers in its 104-88 victory despite the team’s showing up less than 90 minutes before the game because one of its buses was stuck in a snow drift.
snippet: Orlando made a dozen 3-pointers in its 104-88 victory despite the team’s showing up less than 90 minutes before the game because one of its buses was stuck in a snow drift.
